pageContext.claim: “Wow, just revealed that Michael Cohen wrote a “love letter to Trump” manuscript for a new book that he was pushing. Written and submitted long after Charlottesville and Helsinki, his phony reasons for going rogue. Book is exact opposite of his fake testimony, which now is a lie!”
pageContext.analysis: Michael Cohen was shopping a book proposal that was favorable to Trump and ultimately found a publisher, according to a February 2018 report by the Daily Beast, but they told {Politico} they never saw a manuscript. Plus, even if the book does have a manuscript, it’s unlikely to prove Cohen perjured himself. After all, it’s illegal to lie to Congress, but not in books.
